# Helpers

["","one","two","three",{}]
["","one","two","three",{"alpha":1,"beta":2,"gamma":3}]
["",{"alpha":1,"beta":2,"gamma":3}]
[{"string":""},{}]
[{"string":"."},{}]
[{"string":".."},"one","two",{}]
[{"string":"..."},"one","two",{"alpha":1,"beta":2,"gamma":3}]
[{"string":"...."},{"alpha":1,"beta":2,"gamma":3}]

# Partial running on global context

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"

# Partial running on context

[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "One"

[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "Two"

[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "Three"

# Partial running with partials helper

[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "One"
[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "One"

[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "Two"
[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "Two"

[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "Three"
[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "Three"

# Partial running with partials helper + locals argument

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "One"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "One"

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Two"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Two"

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Three"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Three"

# Partial running with partials helper + locals parameter

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "One"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "One"

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Two"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Two"

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Three"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Three"

# Partial running with partials helper + parameters

[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "One"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"
[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "One"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"

[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "Two"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"
[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "Two"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"

[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "Three"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"
[locals] app.config.title: ""
[context] title: "Three"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"

# Partial running with partials helper + parameters + local argument

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "One"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "One"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Two"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Two"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Three"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Three"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"

# Partial running with partials helper + parameters + local parameter

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "One"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "One"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Two"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Two"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"

[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Three"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[context] title: "Three"
[params] alpha: "1"
[params] beta: "2"
[params] gamma: "3"

# Partial running with block content
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[content] content: "..."
[locals] app.config.title: "My Application"
[content] content: "..."
